DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Childhood and Adult Life How Many Total Years Have Lived in Place Where Other People Smoked Cigarettes Indoors Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation when thinking of all their childhood and adult years, of the total number of years they have ever lived in a place where other people smoked cigarettes indoors.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Total Years Lived in Place Where Other People Smoked Cigarettes Indoors
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure._A question about the total number of years a person, over all their childhood and adult years, has ever lived in a place where other people smoked cigarettes indoors.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

ReferenceDocuments.name: In total, for about how many
ReferenceDocuments.description: In total, for about how many years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value sets in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these CDEs.
